channel.title: [PI] ActionHandler [Solved]
channel.description:
My situation after logging in my server. I click on a altar. Everything works, I'm getting a message and my prayer recharges. Second time i click on the altar happens nothing. When I click on other items for example a door, it'll work the first time, but the second time clicking it won't. I found out that the actionhandler doesn't go to the
case ****:
after the first time :O. My ActionHandler.java http://pastebin.com/k3H4gxV6

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @ritonda ritonda
item.description:
@ritonda wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:462797”]Why doesn’t PI make it

	case 6749:
		if (objectId == OBJECTID) {
			c.getPA().object(/*Stuff*/);
		}
	break;

Or better yet change the switch to

switch (objectId) { case ID: /*STUFF*/ break; //OTHER CASES AND STUFF } [/quote]

switch(objectType) {
Object type is the Id of the object and I don't understand what you mean with your codes

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Why doesn’t PI make it

	case 6749:
		if (objectId == OBJECTID) {
			c.getPA().object(/*Stuff*/);
		}
	break;

Or better yet change the switch to

	switch (objectId) {
		case ID:
			/*STUFF*/
		break;
		//OTHER CASES AND STUFF
	}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @ritonda ritonda
item.description:
@ritonda wrote:

My situation after logging in my server.
I click on a altar. Everything works, I’m getting a message and my prayer recharges.
Second time i click on the altar happens nothing.
When I click on other items for example a door, it’ll work the first time, but the second time clicking it won’t.

I found out that the actionhandler doesn’t go to the

case ****:
after the first time :O.

My ActionHandler.java
http://pastebin.com/k3H4gxV6

Read full topic
